title: Wow! You'll love this amazing 2 bed 2 bath in Southfield
map_address: 28600 Pebble Creek Pkwy near 12 Mile Road
posting_body: ['Pebble Creek', '28600 Pebble Creek Pkwy', 'Southfield, MI 48034', 'A wonderful home in Southfield is waiting for you!', 'We currently have a gorgeous 2 bedroom 2 bathroom renting for $1134 per month.', 'This unit comes with 1049 sq ft.', 'All of the home without the hassle!', 'Conveniently located in Southfield, Michigan, Pebble Creek Apartments provides easy access to Northwestern Highway, Interstate 696, Lodge Freeway and is just minutes to Oakland Community College, Detroit Zoo and Applegate Square Shopping Center.', 'These affordable Southfield apartments include an array of amenities such as a 24-hour fitness studio, sparkling swimming pool with free Wi-Fi access and a resident clubhouse.', 'Further conveniences include 24/7 online rent payment and planned resident activities.', 'show contact info', 'Community Highlights:', '◾ Clubhouse', '◾ Courtyard', '◾ Fitness Center', '◾ Free Weights', '◾ Playground', '◾ Pool', '◾ Sundeck', '◾ Weight Machines', '◾ BBQ/Picnic Area', '◾ Dining and Entertaining Nearby', '◾ Free Wi-Fi and Large Screen TV in Clubhouse', '◾ High Speed Internet', '◾ On-Site Maintenance', '◾ Package Receiving', '◾ Public Transportation', '◾ Sand Volleyball Court', '◾ Water, Sewer, and Trash Included', 'Unit Highlights:', '◾ Air Conditioner', '◾ Disposal', '◾ Extra Storage', '◾ Fully equipped kitchen', '◾ Pantry', '◾ Tile Floors', '◾ Washer/Dryer Available for $47/Month', '◾ Washer/Dryer Hookup', '◾ Wheelchair Accessible (Rooms)', '◾ Window Coverings', 'Contact:', 'show contact info', 'Website:', '<URL>', 'Leasing Options:', '12-Month', 'Pet Policy:', 'Cat(s).', 'Dog(s).', '$250 Deposit.', '$25 Monthly Pet Rent. 35 lb Weight Limit.', '2 Pet Limit.', 'Management:', 'Peak Living', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY']
